name: PURCHASE - As a user I want to enter my contact and billing information so that I can complete the purchase of a flight

steps.name: User is on the purchase page after successfully selecting a flight
User sees fields for name, address, city, state, ZIP code, and credit card information

elements.name: Verify Flight Details on Purchase Page

steps.name: User is on the purchase page after successfully selecting a flight
User sees the flight details selected including airline, flight number, price, and fees

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: expected '<h2>' to contain text 'São Paulo to Berlin', but the text was 'Your flight from TLV to SFO has been reserved.'
    + expected - actual

    -'Your flight from TLV to SFO has been reserved.'
    +'São Paulo to Berlin'

    at Context.eval (cypress/e2e/bdd/tests/purchase/purchase.cy.js:40:17)

    at Context.eval (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/createTestFromScenario.js:27:0)

elements.name: Submit Purchase Form with Valid Information

steps.name: User is on the purchase page after successfully selecting a flight
User fills out all required fields with valid information
User sees a confirmation message with the payment details

elements.name: Failed to Submit Purchase Form with Invalid Information

steps.name: User is on the purchase page after successfully selecting a flight
User fills out the form with invalid information
User sees validation errors indicating which fields are missing
